parameters.name: CertType
parameters.description:
The certificate type.

*   **upload**: a user-uploaded SSL certificate.
*   **cas**: a certificate that is acquired through Certificate Management Service.

> If the value of the CertType parameter is **cas**, the **SSLPri** parameter is not required.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The accelerated domain name. You can specify only one domain name.

HTTPS acceleration must be enabled for the accelerated domain name.

parameters.name: ForceSet
parameters.description: Specifies whether to check the certificate name for duplicates. If you set the value to 1, the system does not perform the check and overwrites the information about the existing certificate that uses the same name.

parameters.name: SSLPri
parameters.description: The private key. This parameter is required only if you enable the SSL certificate.

parameters.name: SSLProtocol
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the SSL certificate.

*   **on**
*   **off**

parameters.name: SSLPub
parameters.description: The certificate content. This parameter is required only if you enable the SSL certificate.
